sentence: And last September, after Trump endorsed Harriet Hageman's primary challenge against Rep. Liz Cheney in the race for Wyoming's at-large House seat, he and his allies successfully urged some, but not all, of the other anti-Cheney GOP candidates to drop out of the primary and coalesce around Hageman.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: After meeting with Trump, Georgia's Vernon Jones likely to exit GOP gubernatorial primary

title: After meeting with Trump, Georgia's Vernon Jones likely to exit GOP gubernatorial primary

sentence: Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, who has now been censured by state party officials and the Republican National Committee, is running for reelection against Trump pick Harriet Hageman.
author: Warren Rojas
title: Trump is on an endorsement spree and has now put his MAGA stamp on more than 100 political candidates since leaving the White House

sentence: Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, who has now been censured by state party officials and the Republican National Committee, is running for reelection against Trump pick Harriet Hageman.
author: Warren Rojas
title: Trump is on an endorsement spree and has now put his MAGA stamp on more than 100 political candidates since leaving the White House

sentence: In Wyoming, a slew of candidates dropped out after he announced his support for Harriet Hageman's bid against a top Trump critic, Rep. Liz Cheney.
author: Jill Colvin
title: Donald Trump turns to endorsements to keep bending GOP to his will
